name: Viet Tung Hoang
content: Viet Tung Hoang- Homepage Viet Tung Hoang I am an associate professor in the Department of Computer Science at Florida State University, USA. My research area is cryptography, with a practice-oriented theme. I am interested in broadening the theory of cryptography to understand the exact security of real-world schemes and narrow the performance gap between provable-security designs and heuristic ones. Office: 261 Love Building, Florida State University, Tallahassee, FL 32306Email: tvhoang@cs.fsu.edu Research: Papers    CV Teaching: CIS 5371 (Cryptography). Office hours: MonWed 2:30pm-3:30pm via Zoom.
